alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 14 at 1:58AM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin and Central Yampa River Basin. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From this evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin
